moddy.title: About Moddy
moddy.bio: Moddy is a powerful Discord bot designed to enhance your server with advanced moderation, utility, and entertainment features. Built with reliability and ease of use in mind, Moddy helps server administrators create better communities.

footer.disclaimer: Moddy is not affiliated with Discord Inc.

attribution.title: Attributions
attribution.description: This page lists all the projects, tools, and resources we used or that inspired the development of Moddy. Big thanks to their creators for their work!
attribution.google_fonts: All the icons/emojis you see in the bot come from Google Fonts.
attribution.discordpy: Our entire bot is developed with discord.py.
attribution.userdoccers: This documentation provides us with undocumented endpoints to improve the experience on Moddy.
attribution.railway: We host Moddy on Railway's infrastructure.

we_support.title: We support
we_support.description: Here you'll find projects we like and want to highlight. This isn't a partnership, just initiatives we find interesting and worth supporting.
we_support.empty: No projects to display yet. Check back later!

errors.wrong_user: Only the command author can use these buttons.

user.description: Display detailed information about a Discord user

info.title: ### <:webhook:1438636058660045041> Webhook Information
info.instruction: -# Use the buttons below to manage this webhook

invalid_webhook.title: Invalid Webhook
invalid_webhook.description:
Please provide a valid webhook URL or ID/Token.

**Valid formats:**
‚Ä¢ `https://discord.com/api/webhooks/ID/TOKEN`
‚Ä¢ `ID/TOKEN`

not_found.title: Webhook Not Found
not_found.description: Could not fetch webhook information. The webhook may be invalid or deleted.

errors.author_only: You can't use these buttons, they belong to another user.

success.title: Webhook Deleted
success.description: The webhook **{name}** has been successfully deleted.

failed.title: Deletion Failed
failed.description:
Could not delete the webhook. Status: {status}
```{error}```

success.title: Webhook Updated
success.description: The webhook has been renamed to **{name}**.

failed.title: Update Failed
failed.description:
Could not update the webhook. Status: {status}
```{error}```

send.username_placeholder: Leave empty to use webhook's default name

success.title: Message Sent
success.description: Your message has been sent successfully via the webhook!

failed.title: Send Failed
failed.description:
Could not send the message. Status: {status}
```{error}```

This error has been logged and will be analyzed.
You can provide this code to the developer if needed.

main.title: Configuration Panel
main.description: Welcome to Moddy's configuration panel! Select a module below to configure its settings.
main.no_modules: No modules available at the moment.
main.hint: Select a module to access its detailed configuration.
main.not_implemented: Configuration for module **{module_name}** is not yet available.

errors.wrong_user: <:error:1444049460924776478> Only the user who started the configuration can use this interface.

<:undone:1398729502028333218> **Invalid configuration** - The following fields must be filled:
‚Ä¢ {fields}

no_admin_perms.title: Insufficient Permissions
no_admin_perms.description:
Moddy needs **administrator permissions** to manage server modules.

Please re-invite the bot with the correct permissions.

dev_only.title: Feature in Development
dev_only.description:
Server modules are currently under development and are only accessible to Moddy team members and beta testers.

Join our support server to learn more and participate in testing!

welcome_channel.name: Welcome Channel
welcome_channel.description: Welcome message in a public channel

config.title: Welcome Channel Configuration
config.description: Configure the welcome message sent in a public channel when a new member joins the server.

channel.section_description: Select the channel where welcome messages will be sent

description_modal.label: Embed description
description_modal.placeholder: Leave empty to use the welcome message

config.title: Welcome DM Configuration
config.description: Configure the welcome message sent privately (DM) to new members.

description_modal.label: Embed description
description_modal.placeholder: Leave empty to use the welcome message

interserver.name: Inter-Server
interserver.description: Connect multiple servers via dedicated channels

config.title: Inter-Server Module Configuration
config.description: Connect your server with other Discord servers to create an inter-server communication portal.

channel.section_description: Select the channel that will be connected to other servers

type.section_description: Choose which inter-server you want to join

options.section_description: Configure how messages are displayed in other servers
options.show_server_name_desc: Adds the server name next to the username

warning.title: Security warning
warning.description: Messages sent in this channel will be visible to all connected servers. Make sure your members understand this.

welcome_dm.title: ### <:groups:1446127489842806967> Inter-Server Channel
welcome_dm.body:
<:web:1398729801061240883> This is an international inter-server channel connecting multiple Discord servers.
<:book:1446557736350388364> Please follow the Inter-Server Guidelines and Discord's Terms of Service.
<:verified:1398729677601902635> This channel is moderated by Moddy's moderation team.
<:flag:1446197210198048778> To report a message to our team, join our support server or use /interserver report.

-# You're receiving this message because you sent your first message in an inter-server channel.

interserver.channel_description: üåê Inter-Server Channel | Connect with users from multiple Discord servers | Follow the Inter-Server Guidelines (https://moddy.app/interserver-guidelines) | Moderated by Moddy Team | Report: /interserver report

starboard.name: Starboard
starboard.description: Hall of fame for popular messages

config.title: Starboard Configuration
config.description: Configure the starboard that automatically displays messages with many star reactions.

channel.section_description: Select the channel where popular messages will be displayed

reaction_count.section_description: Number of ‚≠ê reactions needed for a message to appear in the starboard

modal.label: Reaction count
modal.error_range: Reaction count must be between 1 and 100

auto_role.name: Auto Role
auto_role.description: Automatically assigns roles to new members

config.title: Auto Role Configuration
config.description: Configure automatic role assignment for new members and bots joining your server.

member_roles.section_description: Roles that will be automatically assigned to users joining the server

bot_roles.section_description: Roles that will be automatically assigned to bots joining the server

auto_restore_roles.name: Auto Restore Roles
auto_restore_roles.description: Automatically restores roles for returning users

config.title: Auto Restore Roles
config.description: Configure automatic role restoration when a user who left the server returns.

mode.section_description: Choose which roles should be saved

except.label: All except certain roles
except.description: Save all roles except selected ones

excluded_roles.section_description: Select roles that will NOT be saved

included_roles.section_description: Select roles that will be saved

log_channel.section_description: Channel where save and restore logs will be sent (optional)

saved_info.title: Saved roles
saved_info.description: {count} user(s) have saved roles pending restoration

error.no_manager: <:error:1444049460924776478> The module manager is not available.
error.not_configured: <:error:1444049460924776478> The Auto Restore Roles module is not configured on this server.
error.not_enabled: <:error:1444049460924776478> The Auto Restore Roles module is not enabled on this server.

clear.confirm_description: Are you sure you want to delete the saved roles for {user}?
clear.success_description: Saved roles for {user} have been successfully deleted.

view.no_saved_roles: <:info:1401614681440784477> No users have saved roles on this server.
view.title: Users with saved roles
